pullRequest.title: Do not enforce values to be returned from remote cache
pullRequest.bodyText:
The Hotrod client does no longer enforce (previous) values being
returned from the remote cache in the put and removeWithVersion methods
as in the former case the returned value isn't used anyway and in the
latter case the flag should not have any impact at all.

commit.message:
Do not enforce values to be returned from remote cache

The Hotrod client does no longer enforce (previous) values being
returned from the remote cache in the put and removeWithVersion methods
as in the former case the returned value isn't used anyway and in the
latter case the flag should not have any impact at all.
The Hotrod client has been upgraded to 9.4.19.Final.

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>

nodes.bodyText:
When using that method in removeCommandHandlingAdapterInstance(), the return value is actually needed.
That means when removing the FORCE_RETURN_VALUE flag here, the removeCommandHandlingAdapterInstance() method also needs to be changed. I think we can do that here in 1.2.x - the information, whether removal succeeded or not is only logged here anyway.
